description: This Dart source file defines a SettingsProvider class for managing app settings in a Flutter application. It handles loading, toggling, and persisting user preferences related to notifications, reminders, alerts, and synchronization using shared preferences, and interacts with external services for notifications and synchronization.

classes.name: SettingsProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages user settings related to notifications and sync functionalities, interfacing with shared preferences and external services for notifications and synchronization.

methods.name: loadSettings
methods.description: Loads user settings from shared preferences and updates internal state.

methods.name: toggleNotifications
methods.description: Enables or disables notifications and updates preferences and services accordingly.

methods.name: toggleEventReminders
methods.description: Enables or disables event reminders and updates preferences.

methods.name: toggleMaintenanceAlerts
methods.description: Enables or disables maintenance alerts and updates preferences.

methods.name: toggleAutoSync
methods.description: Enables or disables auto synchronization and updates preferences and services.

methods.name: syncNow
methods.description: Manually triggers synchronization and updates internal syncing state.
